text: 4.24 Mak 6.55 Anɨgek, Siliya plopens binɨb okok mɨdupsek takaw anɨb ak nɨŋɨd, binɨb kuŋay yɨbɨl tap keke gak okok dad apel, ne gek suŋ lak. Binɨb anɨb okok, ogɨnap mɨñak gak, ogɨnap tap gak, ogɨnap yul awl gak, ogɨnap wɨdɨn mayn apek apyap pakɨl jep dak, ogɨnap ñɨn tob kumak. Ne kɨlop mɨdupsek gek suŋ lak. Pen ogɨnap kɨcheki mulɨk sɨkak okok, agyokek mɨdtep gɨlak.
